mapper.insert: insert into cafe (id , owner_id, cafeName, address, lat, lng, category) values (default, #{owner_id}, #{cafeName} , #{address}, #{lat} , #{lng} , " ")
mapper.update: update cafe set cafeName = #{cafeName}, address = #{address}, category = #{category} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.cafeName, c.address, c.category, c.lat, c.lng, c.img, count(r.cafe_id) as reviewCount, count(cl.cafe_id) as likeCount FROM cafe c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.id = r.cafe_id LEFT JOIN cafe_like cl ON c.id = cl.cafe_idcafe WHERE (c.category = #{category} OR #{category} = '전체') AND cafeName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') GROUP BY c.id
select id, cafeName, address, category from cafe where id = #{cafeId}
select id, cafeName from cafe where owner_id = #{id}
